Dialogue.Page: Hello, traveler.
We are currently in a troubling situation. Would you care to hear how we got here?

DialogueOption.Text: I'm in a hurry, can I ask you somthing?

Dialogue.Page: Yes?
We came here from the Silverflame system to escape its dying star. Unfortunatley, our vessel, <color=orange>The Astrophytum</color>, suffered damage upon our arival.
Our Central Warp Core malfunctioned, and now <color=orange>The Astrophytum</color> is rapidly miniaturizing into a black hole!
Worse still, we couldn't even recover any of our <color=orange>Exploration Logs</color> from the Silverflame system as most of the computers were stuck telling us to evacuate.

If <color=orange>The Astrophytum</color> isn't fixed, we won't be able to recover our <color=orange>Exploration Logs</color>. And, if those logs aren't recovered, the history of the Silverflame system and the knowledge we gained will be lost.
If only we had enough time to fix <color=orange>The Astrophytum</color>...
Bye for now.
We appreciate your offer, but I'm worried there may not be enough time to save our <color=orange>Exploration Logs</color>.
We would need to figure out what's wrong with <color=orange>The Astrophytum</color>, find a solution, and fix <color=orange>The Astrophytum</color> all before it is sucked into the black hole.
We only had just over 20 minutes to evacuate, so unfortunately, I'm doubtful there's any way to get all that done in what little time we have...
If you want to try anyways, you can use this shuttle behind me to warp directly to <color=orange>The Astrophytum</color>, though it may be wise to bring your own ship just in case.
Just make sure to evacuate if you can't fix <color=orange>The Astrophytum</color> before it's fully consumed. Don't get crushed!
<color=orange>The Astrophytum</color> (our Vessel)'s Central Warp Core malfuntioned after we warped away from the Silverflame system.
We were unable to recover our <color=orange>Exploration Logs</color> durring the evacuation. Those logs have all of our knowledge we gathered at the Silverflame system.
In order to retrieve our <color=orange>Exploration Logs</color>, you must find a way to fix <color=orange>The Astrophytum</color> to return the computers to normal.
You can go to <color=orange>The Astrophytum</color> with the shuttle behind me or with your own ship.
Do you have anything to ask us?
Woah. Thank you so much!
The history of the Silverflame system is saved!

DialogueOption.Text: Unfortunately, your Vessel won't stay fixed for long.

Dialogue.Page: Dispite how much <color=orange>The Astrophytum</color> means to me, I think I can accept this.
You wrote down everything else you found there in your own Ship Log, right?
That means the history of <color=orange>The Astrophytum</color> is also preserved.
I have seen at least one other Nomai around here, so I'm sure we can find someone willing to share their Vessel with us.
We will take time to explore the other miniature systems in this area. Now that our <color=orange>Exploration Logs</color> are no longer in immediate danger, I recommend you explore them too.
Thank you so much for helping us!
Will you resume exploring right away, or do you want to rest here for a little bit?

DialogueOption.Text: I want to explore! [CONTINUE CURRENT LOOP]
I'll rest for a little bit. [SEE END SCREEN]

Dialogue.Page: We hope to see you again. Safe travels!
